root.name: Star Wars: Monopoly
root.description: Overview Star Wars: Monopoly is well.. you guessed it, Star Wars themed Monopoly. The main differences are the names of the properties and the playable characters. Playable Characters R2-D2Han SoloPrincess LeiaLuke SkywalkerDarth VaderStorm TrooperBobo FettChewbacca Property Names: Dagobah: SwampDagobah: Yoda's HutHoth: Frozen PlainHoth: North BridgeHoth: Echo BaseTatooine: Lar's HomesteadTatooine: Mos EisleyTatooine: Jabba's PalaceYavin 4: War RoomYavin 4: Massassi TempleYavin 4: Temple Throne RoomCloud City: Landing PlatformCloud City: Carbon Freezing ChamberCloud City: Reactor Control RoomDeath Star: Landing BayDeath Star: Throne RoomDeath Star: Central CoreEndor: ForestEndor: Shield Generator Endor: Ewok VillageCoruscant: Monument SquareCoruscant: Imperial PalaceStarships: Tie FighterStarships: Millennium FalconStarships: X-WingStarships: Star DestroyerUtility: Moisture FarmUtility: Reactor Core There is also a sizable number of game options. Colonies Per Starport: 45Total Colonies: 1220326088Total Starports: 36121722Free Parking: 05007501000Initial Cash: 7501000150025004000Salary: 0100200300400Tax Rate Percentage: 05101520Flat Tax: 0100200300400Bounty: 02575150300Turns in Jail: 12345Jail Fee 02550100200Colonies Remaining for Shortage: 0161220Starports Remaining for Shortage: 013610Mortgage Interest Rate Percentage: 05102030Auction Time Delay: 3451020 And five other options. Roll Dice to Decide Start Order.Even Build Rule.Collect Extra Money for Landing on Go.Deal Two Properties Before StartingFree Parking Rule
